content: f2tog around post of same st skip around post of next st 1hdc into top of same st 1f around post of same st and at the same time under the second leg of previous f2tog ftr and f decrease around post of same st and at the same time under the second leg of previous f2tog one skip around post of next st pic 4 6b skip f around second leg of f2tog in the previous round f half_double_crochet into top of same st 1dc into top of same st pic 5 skip next st 4b 6 times join b pic 1 pic 2 pic 3 half_double_crochet double_crochet f f pic 4 pic 5 round 32 video round 33 ch2 3b 1f 1b twice 1f 6b rightcross leftcross 3b 6 times join b round 33 video round 33 right cross and left cross round 34 ch2 3b popcorn f 1b 1f 1b popcorn f 5b rightcross 2b leftcross 2b 6 times join b round 35 ch2 3b 1b around popcorn f 1b popcorn f 1b 1b around popcorn f 4b rightcross 4b leftcross 1b 6 times join b round 36 ch2 5b 1b around popcorn f 5b rightcross 6b leftcross 6 times join b © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 18 note the number of stitches written at the end of each row is not valid when crocheting handles after round 36 it is recommended to check the final height if you do not want the bag to be too long in length my bag is up to round 36 high almost equal to its width if the height is greater than or equal to the width then i advise you to start crocheting the handles from the next round if you want a bag of the same proportions as my bag handles can be done in any round edge stitches for handles are highlighted in yellow in the chart after you decide to make the handles crochet the next 4 rounds as described except for selected stitches skip the selected stitches for the first of these four rounds instead of selected stitches crochet ch25 unless otherwise written in italics in the second round 1dc in each of 25 chain in the third and fourth rounds 1f in each of 25 double_crochet then work according to the description starting with the round 54 if you don t want to change the position of the bag handles you can crochet from page 23 © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 19 round 37 ch2 1f around post of last st in the previous round i e around post of second f of the leftcross skip 1st st 9b rightcross 2b 6b leftcross 9b rightcross 6b 2b leftcross 9b rightcross 8b leftcross 9b rightcross 2b 6b leftcross 9b rightcross 6b 2b leftcross 9b rightcross 8b working behind first f of this round 1btr around post of 1st st in the previous round 1f around post of penultimate f in the
